front.div:
11.
The manual provides:
• Generic coding and calculation instructions related to national hospital administrative databases,
• Cross walk from ICD 9 to ICD 10 codes for each indicator,
• Detailed definitions for calculation of indicators,
• Flow charts for visualising the calculation process, and
• Quick-step overview of essential tasks for data preparation.
12.
It is anticipated that further revisions to the methodology presented in this manual will be made
based on the collective experiences of those using the manual over time.
4.
Adapted from CIHI (2004).
